channel.title: Stupid Shops
channel.description:
I created a couple of shops and threw them in my home area, barb village, and for some akward reason they seem to disconnect people once they are "traded" which is the only way to open up shop, when it happens it shos this in my run.bat console.
[code] E: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -82 E: at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16941) E: at client.packetProcess(client.java:15849) E: at client.process(client.java:15821) E: at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) E: at server.main(server.java:55) [/code]
The -82 after boundsexception actually changes each time it happens

item.title: Stupid Shops
item.dc:creator: @Dominionscape Dominionscape
item.description:
@Dominionscape wrote:

Butters dream source with his client too, i moved them back to the original position and they work fine now. but i realy dont want them there, guess ill just have to base my shops around butters =(

Read full topic

no because the shops worked PERFECT before i moved them, its once i changed there X,Y Coords they started acting up
